title: Bug 59599Race condition in test suite for incremental
description: Bug 59599Race condition in test suite for incremental This appears to be due to a racecondition between checking directory contents and waiting for the compilation tocomplete. I have an environment in which I can test candidate fixes if you cangive me a pointer for what to tweak...
OB: On faster machines (my linux desktop, andy's home pc) several of the tests inajcTests.xml are failing (suite attached).
